name: Wuthering Heights
summary_text: A servant in the house of Wuthering Heights tells a traveler the unfortunate tale of lovers Cathy and Heathcliff.

name: The Kitchen
summary_text: The wives of New York gangsters in Hell's Kitchen in the 1970s continue to operate their husbands' rackets after they're locked up in prison.

name: A Guy Thing
summary_text: A soon-to-be husband wakes up on the morning after his bachelor party in bed with another woman.

name: Bad Trip
summary_text: This mix of a scripted buddy comedy road movie and a real hidden camera prank show follows the outrageous misadventures of two buds stuck in a rut who embark on a cross-country road trip to NYC. The storyline sets up shocking real pranks.

name: The Enigma of Kaspar Hauser
summary_text: A young man named Kaspar Hauser suddenly appears in Nuremberg in 1828, barely able to talk or walk, and bearing a strange note.

name: Smiley Face
summary_text: After a young actress unknowingly eats her roommate's marijuana cupcakes, her day becomes a series of misadventures.

name: And Soon the Darkness
summary_text: When two American girls on a bike trip in a remote part of Argentina split up and one of them goes missing, the other must find her before her worst fears are realized.

name: Vox Lux
summary_text: An unusual set of circumstances brings unexpected success to a pop star.

name: Chained
summary_text: A young man held prisoner by a cab-driving serial killer must make a life or death choice between following in his captor's footsteps or breaking free.

name: The Bachelor
summary_text: A commitment-phobic man goes in search of a bride, including his fed-up girlfriend, to inherit his grandfather's one hundred million dollar inheritance.

name: Bait
summary_text: A freak tsunami traps shoppers at a coastal Australian supermarket inside the building - along with 12-foot Great White Sharks.

name: Damage
summary_text: A member of Parliament falls passionately in love with his son's fiancée despite the dangers of discovery.

name: Being Flynn
summary_text: Working in a Boston homeless shelter, Nick Flynn re-encounters his father, a con man and self-proclaimed poet. Sensing trouble in his own life, Nick wrestles with the notion of reaching out yet again to his dad.

name: Taxidermia
summary_text: Three generations of men, including a pervert that constantly seeks for new kinds of satisfaction, an obese speed eater and a passionate embalmer.

name: She's the One
summary_text: The love lives of two brothers, Mickey and Francis, interconnect as Francis cheats on his wife with Mickey's ex-girlfriend, while Mickey impulsively marries a stranger.

name: Fort Apache
summary_text: At Fort Apache, an honorable and veteran war captain finds conflict when his regime is placed under the command of a young, glory hungry lieutenant colonel with no respect for the local Indian tribe.

name: [REC] 4: Apocalypse
summary_text: An ill-fated television reporter is rescued and sent on a voyage across the ocean, but she is followed by the deadly virus that has plagued her and numerous others.

name: The Englishman Who Went Up a Hill But Came Down a Mountain
summary_text: When an English cartographer must tell a Welsh village that their mountain is only a hill, the offended community sets out to change that.

name: I Vitelloni
summary_text: A character study of five young men at crucial turning points in their lives in a small town in Italy.

name: Wounds
summary_text: Disturbing and mysterious things begin to happen to a bartender in New Orleans after he picks up a phone left behind at his bar.

name: The Jungle Book
summary_text: Rudyard Kipling's classic tale of Mowgli, the orphaned jungle boy raised by wild animals, and how he becomes king of the jungle.

name: Den brysomme mannen
summary_text: In a strange city where every person seems content beyond reason a new man arrives in town and stirs up trouble by asking too many questions.

name: The Prince of Tides
summary_text: A troubled man talks to his suicidal sister's psychiatrist about their family history and falls in love with her in the process.

name: Tom at the Farm
summary_text: A grieving man meets his lover's family, who were not aware of their son's sexual orientation.

name: The Little Shop of Horrors
summary_text: A clumsy young man nurtures a plant and discovers that it's carnivorous, forcing him to kill to feed it.

name: The Emperor's Club
summary_text: An idealistic prep school teacher attempts to redeem an incorrigible student.

name: Basket Case
summary_text: A young man carrying a big basket that contains his extremely deformed Siamese-twin brother seeks vengeance on the doctors who separated them against their will.

name: The Program
summary_text: An Irish sports journalist becomes convinced that Lance Armstrong's performances during the Tour de France victories are fueled by banned substances. With this conviction, he starts hunting for evidence that will expose Armstrong.

name: Timbuktu
summary_text: A cattle herder and his family who reside in the dunes of Timbuktu find their quiet lives -- which are typically free of the Jihadists determined to control their faith -- abruptly disturbed.

name: As It Is in Heaven
summary_text: A famous international conductor returns to his small childhood town in Sweden for early retirement. He's asked to help with the church choir. He affects the lives of all in the choir.

name: Rabid
summary_text: A young woman develops a taste for human blood after experimental plastic surgery, and her victims turn into blood-thirsty zombies, leading into a city-wide epidemic.

name: Hamlet 2
summary_text: In this irreverent comedy, a failed actor-turned-worse-high-school-drama-teacher rallies his Tucson, AZ students as he conceives and stages politically incorrect musical sequel to Shakespeare's Hamlet.

name: Bugsy Malone
summary_text: The classic gangster story of Bugsy Malone told with an all-child cast.

name: Rajneeti
summary_text: When the American-educated scion of a powerful Indian family returns to the subcontinent, his first taste of power starts him down a corrupt path.

name: Kaminey
summary_text: The desperate lives of two estranged twin brothers converge over missing drugs, politics, racial prejudice, corrupt cops and an unplanned pregnancy.

name: Saban Oglu Saban
summary_text: Husamettin the commander in the army is constantly bothered by the stupidity of one of his soldiers shaban, after discharge from the army shaban and his friend Ramazan work in a night club ...                See full summary »

name: Flash of Genius
summary_text: Robert Kearns takes on the Detroit automakers who he claims stole his idea for the intermittent windshield wiper.

name: The Son of No One
summary_text: A young cop is assigned to a precinct in the working class neighborhood where he grew up, and an old secret threatens to destroy his life and his family.

name: 36th Precinct
summary_text: 2 cops are promised by the retiring chief of the Paris police that the one, getting the violent gang robbing armored trucks, will get his job. The 2 will do whatever it takes to get the promotion, even if it means breaking the law.

name: Night Hunter
summary_text: A weathered Lieutenant, his police force, and a local vigilante are all caught up in a dangerous scheme involving a recently arrested, troubled man who's linked to years of female abductions and murders.

name: The Accidental Spy
summary_text: At a Hong Kong shopping center, Buck Yuen's (Jackie Chan's) intuition warns him. He saves a robbery's loot and gets on television, ends up in Istanbul via South Korea, and accidentally becomes a spy. Fortunately, he knows Kung Fu.

name: They Shoot Horses, Don't They?
summary_text: The lives of a disparate group of contestants intertwine in an inhumanely grueling dance marathon.

name: I Think I Love My Wife
summary_text: A married man who daydreams about being with other women finds his will and morals tested after he's visited by the ex-mistress of his old friend.

name: Queen Margot
summary_text: Young Queen Margot finds herself trapped in an arranged marriage amidst a religious war between Catholics and Protestants. She hopes to escape with a new lover, but finds herself imprisoned by her powerful and ruthless family.

name: Once Upon a Time in Mumbaai
summary_text: A smuggler rises to power in in 1970s Mumbai, a younger gangster seeks to overthrow him and a police officer is caught in the middle.

name: The Stepford Wives
summary_text: Joanna Eberhart has come to the quaint little town of Stepford, Connecticut with her family, but soon discovers there lies a sinister truth in the all too perfect behavior of the female residents.

name: The Burning
summary_text: A former summer camp caretaker, horribly burned from a prank gone wrong, lurks around an upstate New York summer camp bent on killing the teenagers responsible for his disfigurement.

name: Tere Naam
summary_text: Problems arise when Radhey Mohan, a delinquent falls in love with a girl named Nirjara.

name: Oye Lucky! Lucky Oye!
summary_text: Lovinder Singh, a thief now in custody and facing trial, reflects on his life of crime while the press reflect on how he managed to get away with so much before being arrested.

name: The Panic in Needle Park
summary_text: Follows the lives of heroin addicts who frequent "Needle Park" in New York City.

name: Smashed
summary_text: A married couple whose bond is built on a mutual love of alcohol gets their relationship put to the test when the wife decides to get sober.

name: Ricochet
summary_text: A District Attorney is terrorized by the criminal he put away years ago when he was a cop.

name: House of Wax
summary_text: An associate burns down a wax museum with the owner inside, but he survives only to become vengeful and murderous.

name: In a Valley of Violence
summary_text: A mysterious stranger and a random act of violence drag a town of misfits and nitwits into the bloody crosshairs of revenge.

name: The Chef
summary_text: A veteran chef faces off against his restaurant group's new CEO, who wants to the establishment to lose a star from its rating in order to bring in a younger chef who specializes in molecular gastronomy.

name: Over the Moon
summary_text: In this animated musical, a girl builds a rocket ship and blasts off, hoping to meet a mythical moon goddess.

name: Ocho apellidos vascos
summary_text: Rafael, a Sevillian who has never left Andalucia, decides to leave his homeland to follow Amaia, a Basque girl unlike other women whom he has ever known.

name: Falling Inn Love
summary_text: When city girl Gabriela spontaneously enters a contest and wins a rustic New Zealand inn, she teams up with bighearted contractor Jake Taylor to fix and flip it.

name: Assassination Nation
summary_text: After a malicious data hack exposes the secrets of the perpetually American town of Salem, chaos descends and four girls must fight to survive, while coping with the hack themselves.

name: These Final Hours
summary_text: A self-obsessed young man makes his way to the party-to-end-all-parties on the last day on Earth, but ends up saving the life of a little girl searching for her father. Their relationship ultimately leads him on the path to redemption.

name: The Incredible Shrinking Man
summary_text: When Scott Carey begins to shrink because of exposure to a combination of radiation and insecticide, medical science is powerless to help him.

name: The Bag Man
summary_text: A criminal bides his time at a seedy motel, waiting for his boss after killing several men and making away with a mystery bag.

name: American Heist
summary_text: James owes his life to his older brother, Frankie after taking the rap for a crime they committed together. While Frankie served time, James worked to turn his life around, got a steady job and began courting his former girlfriend Emily. Now, Frankie is released and back on the streets with no money and no place to go.

name: Tampopo
summary_text: A truck driver stops at a small family-run noodle shop and decides to help its fledgling business. The story is intertwined with various vignettes about the relationship of love and food.

name: Something Wild
summary_text: A free-spirited woman "kidnaps" a yuppie for a weekend of adventure. But the fun quickly takes a dangerous turn when her ex-convict husband shows up.

name: Beauty Shop
summary_text: A determined hairstylist (Queen Latifah) competes with her former boss (Kevin Bacon) after opening her own business in Atlanta.

name: Heart and Souls
summary_text: An unhappy businessman finds a new sense of purpose after he's tasked with helping a quartet of ghosts fulfill their last wishes before moving on to the afterlife.

name: The Poughkeepsie Tapes
summary_text: In an abandoned house in Poughkeepsie, New York murder investigators uncover hundreds of tapes showing decades of a serial killer's work.

name: Infamous
summary_text: While researching his novel "In Cold Blood", Truman Capote develops a close relationship with convicted murderers Dick Hickock and Perry Smith.

name: Il divo
summary_text: The story of Italian politician Giulio Andreotti, who has served as Prime Minister of Italy seven times since the restoration of democracy in 1946.

name: The Great Race
summary_text: In the early 20th century, two rivals, the heroic Leslie and the despicable Professor Fate, engage in an epic automobile race from New York to Paris.

name: Elle s'appelait Sarah
summary_text: In modern-day Paris, a journalist finds her life becoming entwined with a young girl whose family was torn apart during the notorious Vel' d'Hiv Roundup in 1942.

name: She-Devil
summary_text: A surprisingly resourceful housewife vows revenge on her husband when he begins an affair with a wealthy romance novelist.

name: To Live
summary_text: After Fugui and Jiazhen lose their personal fortunes, they raise a family and survive difficult cultural changes during 1940s to 1970s China.

name: The Parallax View
summary_text: An ambitious reporter gets in way-over-his-head trouble while investigating a senator's assassination which leads to a vast conspiracy involving a multinational corporation behind every event in the world's headlines.

name: La Grande Vadrouille
summary_text: Several ordinary Frenchmen go on an epic voyage through the occupied country to the free zone as they help British pilots avoid Nazi captivity.

name: Urban Legends: Final Cut
summary_text: A film school is the center of a fresh spate of killings based on urban legends.

name: The In-Laws
summary_text: Right before his daughter's wedding, a mild-mannered foot doctor discovers that his future son-in-law's father is a free-wheeling international spy.

name: Extraordinary Measures
summary_text: A drama centered on the efforts of John and Aileen Crowley to find a researcher who might have a cure for their two children's rare genetic disorder.

name: Borgman
summary_text: A vagrant enters the lives of an arrogant upper-class family, turning their lives into a psychological nightmare in the process.

name: Birdman of Alcatraz
summary_text: A surly convicted murderer held in permanent isolation redeems himself when he becomes a renowned bird expert.

name: The Escapist
summary_text: Frank's 14 years into a life sentence when he decides to break out of the London prison to set things right with his ill junkie daughter. He plans an ingenious escape requiring 4 inmates with different skills.

name: Red Corner
summary_text: An American attorney on business in China is wrongfully arrested and put on trial for murder, with a female defense lawyer from the country the only key to proving his innocence.

name: Shadows and Fog
summary_text: With a serial strangler on the loose, a bookkeeper wanders around town searching for the vigilante group intent on catching the killer.

name: The Great Train Robbery
summary_text: England, 1850s. A master criminal aims to rob a train of a large sum of gold. Security is incredibly tight and the task seems an impossible one. However, he has a plan and just the right people to carry it out.

name: To All the Boys: Always and Forever
summary_text: Senior year of high school takes center stage as Lara Jean returns from a family trip to Korea and considers her college plans - with and without Peter.

name: First They Killed My Father
summary_text: Cambodian author and human rights activist Loung Ung recounts the horrors she suffered as a child under the rule of the deadly Khmer Rouge.

name: You Should Have Left
summary_text: A former banker, his actress wife, and their spirited daughter book a vacation at an isolated modern home in the Welsh countryside where nothing is quite as it seems.

name: Outpost
summary_text: In war-torn Eastern Europe, a mysterious businessman hires a group of mercenaries on a routine mission to protect him not knowing of the long-hidden secret that lies there.

name: The Ten
summary_text: Ten stories, each inspired by one of the ten commandments.

name: Margaret
summary_text: A young woman witnesses a bus accident, and is caught up in the aftermath, where the question of whether or not it was intentional affects many people's lives.

name: Looking for Eric
summary_text: Eric, a football fanatic postman whose life is descending into crisis, receives some life coaching from the famously philosophical Eric Cantona.

name: The Haunting in Connecticut 2: Ghosts of Georgia
summary_text: A young family moves into a historic home in Georgia, only to learn they are not the house's only inhabitants. Soon they find themselves in the presence of a secret rising from underground and threatening to bring down anyone in its path.

name: On the Town
summary_text: Three sailors wreak havoc as they search for love during a whirlwind 24-hour leave in New York City.

name: Brad's Status
summary_text: A father takes his son to tour colleges on the East Coast and meets up with an old friend who makes him feel inferior about his life's choices.

name: The Monster
summary_text: A mother and daughter must confront a terrifying monster when they break down on a deserted road.

name: The Grand Seduction
summary_text: To survive, a dying Newfoundland fishing village must convince a young doctor to take up residence by any means necessary.

name: The Hole in the Ground
summary_text: A single mother living in the Irish countryside with her son begins to suspect he may not be her son at all, and fears his increasingly disturbing behavior is linked to a mysterious sinkhole in the forest behind their house.

name: The Turin Horse
summary_text: A rural farmer is forced to confront the mortality of his faithful horse.

name: Müslüm
summary_text: A biopic about turkish vocal artist Müslüm Gürses, drama, childhood, his life.

name: A Star Is Born
summary_text: A film star helps a young singer and actress find fame, even as age and alcoholism send his own career on a downward spiral.

name: Silent Movie
summary_text: A film director and his strange friends struggle to produce the first major silent feature film in forty years.

name: Brubaker
summary_text: The new warden of a small prison farm in Arkansas tries to clean it up of corruption after initially posing as an inmate.

name: The Dark Half
summary_text: A writer's fictional alter ego wants to take over his life...at any price.

name: Racing Stripes
summary_text: An abandoned zebra grows up believing he is a racehorse, and, with the help of his barnyard friends and a teenage girl, sets out to achieve his dream of racing with thoroughbreds.

name: Vampyr
summary_text: A drifter obsessed with the supernatural stumbles upon an inn where a severely ill adolescent girl is slowly becoming a vampire.

name: Facing the Giants
summary_text: A losing coach with an underdog football team faces their giants of fear and failure on and off the field to surprising results.

name: The Miracle Worker
summary_text: The story of Anne Sullivan's struggle to teach the blind and deaf Helen Keller how to communicate.

name: Mrs. Miniver
summary_text: A British family struggles to survive the first months of World War II.

name: River's Edge
summary_text: A high school slacker commits a shocking act and proceeds to let his friends in on the secret. However, the friends' reaction is almost as ambiguous and perplexing as the crime itself.

name: Mother's Day
summary_text: The sadistic members of a villainous family return to their childhood home to terrorize the new home owners and their guests.

name: Married to the Mob
summary_text: A mobster's wife hates her lifestyle, but gets a chance to change it when her husband is killed - if the Long Island mob and the FBI let her.

name: Dangerous Beauty
summary_text: A Venetian courtesan becomes a hero to her city, but later becomes the target of an inquisition by the Church for witchcraft.

A modern and stylish kaleidoscope of interconnected love and relationships linking characters from different cities and countries in a vivid, suspenseful and deeply moving tale of romantic life in the 21st century.

name: Pay the Ghost
summary_text: A professor frantically searches for his son who was abducted during a Halloween carnival.

name: Tightrope
summary_text: New Orleans single dad and cop Wes Block (Clint Eastwood) goes after a serial rapist-killer, but when he gets too close to the target, the hunter suddenly becomes the hunted.

name: She Wore a Yellow Ribbon
summary_text: Captain Nathan Brittles, on the eve of retirement, takes out a last patrol to stop an impending massive Indian attack. Encumbered by women who must be evacuated, Brittles finds his mission imperiled.

name: Sisters
summary_text: A small-time reporter tries to convince the police she saw a murder in the apartment across from hers.

name: Extinction
summary_text: And suddenly, overnight, the world came to a halt. Two men, two survivors, one kid, and hatred that separates them. A place forgotten by everyone, including the creatures that inhabit the Earth... until now.

name: Canadian Bacon
summary_text: The U.S. President, low in the opinion polls, gets talked into raising his popularity by trying to start a cold war against Canada.

name: Wing Commander
summary_text: Blair, a fighter pilot, joins an interstellar war to fight the evil Kilrathi who are trying to destroy the universe.

name: Maggie's Plan
summary_text: Maggie wants to have a baby, raising him on her own, but when she gets romantically involved with John, a married man, things get complicated and all the balance of Maggie's plans may collapse.

name: Monsieur Verdoux
summary_text: A suave but cynical man supports his family by marrying and murdering rich women for their money, but the job has some occupational hazards.

name: The Good Neighbor
summary_text: A pair of mischievous high school kids create the illusion of a haunting on an unsuspecting elderly neighbor while keeping his every reaction under surveillance. A series of coincidences leads to tragedy.

name: Mulholland Falls
summary_text: In 1950's Los Angeles, a special crime squad of the LAPD investigates the murder of a young woman.

name: Much Ado About Nothing
summary_text: A modern retelling of Shakespeare's classic comedy about two pairs of lovers with different takes on romance and a way with words.

name: The Beguiled
summary_text: While imprisoned in a Confederate girls' boarding school, an injured Union soldier cons his way into each of the lonely women's hearts, causing them to turn on each other, and eventually, on him.

name: Deathgasm
summary_text: Two teenage boys unwittingly summon an ancient evil entity known as The Blind One by delving into black magic while trying to escape their mundane lives.

name: The Color of Paradise
summary_text: The story of Mohammed, a blind Iranian boy and his father, Hashem, who is always oscillating between accepting his son as he is and abandoning him, as he represents a burden for him, after the loss of his wife.

name: Memories
summary_text: "Memories" is made up of three separate science-fiction stories. In the first, "Magnetic Rose," four space travelers are drawn into an abandoned spaceship that contains a world created by ...                See full summary »

name: The Big Country
summary_text: A New Englander arrives in the Old West, where he becomes embroiled in a feud between two families over a valuable patch of land.

name: Saaho
summary_text: An undercover cop becomes embroiled in a battle with warring criminals who want to acquire a "black box," their ultimate key to a treasure.

name: Guarding Tess
summary_text: A former U.S. First Lady wants a particular Secret Service agent to head her bodyguard detail, even though he can't stand her.

name: Prom Night
summary_text: At a high school senior prom, a masked killer stalks four teenagers who were responsible for the accidental death of a classmate six years previously.

name: The Overnight
summary_text: Alex, Emily, and their son, RJ, are new to Los Angeles. A chance meeting at the park introduces them to the mysterious Kurt, Charlotte, and Max. A family "playdate" becomes increasingly interesting as the night goes on.

name: Boys and Girls
summary_text: A friendship is put to the ultimate test when two best friends wind up in bed together.

name: Frosty the Snowman
summary_text: A living snowman and a little girl struggle to elude a greedy magician who is after the snowman's magic hat.

name: The Music Man
summary_text: Harold Hill poses as a boys' band leader to con naive Iowa townsfolk.

name: The Command
summary_text: The film follows the 2000 K-141 Kursk submarine disaster and the governmental negligence that followed. As the sailors fight for survival, their families desperately battle political obstacles and impossible odds to save them.

name: Security
summary_text: A security guard protects an eleven year-old girl who is being targeted by a gang for participating as a trial witness.

name: The Gods Must Be Crazy II
summary_text: 6 people comically meet in the Kalahari desert: a female NYC lawyer flying with a local zoologist/pilot in a mini-plane, a Cuban and an African soldier taking each other POW, a Boer elephant poacher and a bushman looking for his 2 children.

name: Wizards of Waverly Place: The Movie
summary_text: A young wizard conjures a spell that puts her family in jeopardy.

name: Devil's Due
summary_text: After a mysterious, lost night on their honeymoon, a newlywed couple finds themselves dealing with an earlier-than-planned pregnancy.

name: Evangelion: 2.0 You Can (Not) Advance
summary_text: Under constant attack by Angels, NERV introduces two new pilots: the mysterious Makinami Mari Illustrous and the intense Asuka Langley Shikinami. Parallel to the incursion, Gendo Ikari and ...                See full summary »

name: Shrooms
summary_text: A group of friends are stalked and murdered whilst looking for psilocybin mushrooms in the Irish woods.

name: The Room
summary_text: Matt and Kate buy an isolated house. While moving, they discover a strange room that grants them an unlimited number of material wishes. But, since Kate has had two miscarriages, what they miss the most is a child.

name: The Hoax
summary_text: In what would cause a fantastic media frenzy, Clifford Irving sells his bogus biography of Howard Hughes to a premiere publishing house in the early 1970s.

name: Moonwalker
summary_text: Anthology movie by, and starring, Michael Jackson in his prime, combining a number of music videos from his bestselling "Bad" album with a fantasy tale of Michael's confrontation with a ruthless drug dealer known as Mr. Big.

name: The Ghost and Mrs. Muir
summary_text: In 1900, a young widow finds her seaside cottage is haunted and forms a unique relationship with the ghost.

name: Laurel Canyon
summary_text: When an uptight young man and his fiancée move into his libertine mother's house, the resulting clash of life attitudes shakes everyone up.

name: The Informers
summary_text: One week in L.A. in 1983, featuring movie executives, rock stars, a vampire and other morally challenged characters in adventures laced with sex, drugs and violence.

name: The Survivalist
summary_text: In a time of starvation, a survivalist lives off a small plot of land hidden deep in forest. When two women seeking food and shelter discover his farm, he finds his existence threatened.

name: Pet
summary_text: A man bumps into an old crush and holds her captive underneath the animal shelter where he works.

name: Journey to the Center of the Earth
summary_text: An Edinburgh professor and assorted colleagues follow an explorer's trail down an extinct Icelandic volcano to the earth's center.

name: Queen of Katwe
summary_text: A Ugandan girl sees her world rapidly change after being introduced to the game of chess.

name: Feast of Love
summary_text: A meditation on love and its various incarnations, set within a community of friends in Oregon. and is described as an exploration of the magical, mysterious and sometimes painful incarnations of love.

name: Iqbal
summary_text: Iqbal, the deaf and mute son of a farmer, has a passion for the game of cricket and seeks the tutelage of a washed-up, alcoholic ex-player.

name: Guys and Dolls
summary_text: In New York, a gambler is challenged to take a cold female missionary to Havana, but they fall for each other, and the bet has a hidden motive to finance a crap game.

name: Ibiza
summary_text: A young American woman and her two best friends seek out a hot DJ in Spain.

name: A Hijacking
summary_text: The crew of a Danish cargo ship is hijacked by Somali pirates who proceed to engage in escalating negotiations with authorities in Copenhagen.

name: Fame
summary_text: An updated version of the musical Fame (1980), which centered on the students of the New York Academy of Performing Arts. The name of the school in 1980 was Fiorello Laguardia High School.

name: Twice Born
summary_text: A mother brings her teenage son to Sarajevo, where his father died in the Bosnian conflict years ago.

name: Kissing Jessica Stein
summary_text: A woman searching for the perfect man instead discovers the perfect woman.

name: City of the Living Dead
summary_text: A reporter and a psychic race to close the Gates of Hell after the suicide of a clergyman caused them to open, allowing the dead to rise from their graves.

name: Little Buddha
summary_text: After the death of Lama Dorje, Tibetan Buddhist monks find three children - one American and two Nepalese - who may be the rebirth of their great teacher.

name: Happy as Lazzaro
summary_text: An unceasingly kind Italian peasant and his family are blatantly exploited by a tobacco baroness.

name: Mine
summary_text: After a failed assassination attempt, a United States Marine finds himself stranded in the desert. Exposed to the elements, he must survive the dangers of the desert and battle the psychological and physical tolls of the treacherous conditions.

name: All the Right Moves
summary_text: An ambitious young football star is trapped in a dying mill town--unless his gridiron skills can win him a way out.

name: Furry Vengeance
summary_text: In the Oregon wilderness, a real-estate developer's new housing subdivision faces a unique group of protestors: local woodland creatures who don't want their homes disturbed.

name: The Girlfriend Experience
summary_text: A drama set in the days leading up to the 2008 Presidential election, and centered on a high-end Manhattan call girl meeting the challenges of her boyfriend, her clients, and her work.

name: Too Big to Fail
summary_text: Chronicles the financial meltdown of 2008 and centers on Treasury Secretary Henry Paulson.

name: Johnny Guitar
summary_text: After helping a wounded gang member, a strong-willed female saloon owner is wrongly suspected of murder and bank robbery by a lynch mob.

name: The Tale
summary_text: A woman filming a documentary on childhood rape victims starts to question the nature of her childhood relationship with her riding instructor and running coach.

name: Desperate Measures
summary_text: Frank Conner is an honest police officer who desperately needs to save his son's life. However, after losing all hope, he finds out that a criminal Peter McCabe in jail is his only savior.

name: Gangaajal
summary_text: An IPS officer motivates and leads a dysfunctional, corrupt police force of Tezpur to fight against the corrupt politician.

name: Yes Day
summary_text: A mom and dad who usually say no decide to say yes to their kids' wildest requests with a few ground rules on a whirlwind day of fun and adventure.

name: Pillow Talk
summary_text: An interior decorator and a playboy songwriter share a telephone party line and size each other up.

name: To Sir, with Love
summary_text: Idealistic engineer-trainee and his experiences in teaching a group of rambunctious white high school students from the slums of London's East End.

name: Coogan's Bluff
summary_text: Arizona Deputy Sheriff Coogan (Clint Eastwood) is sent to New York City to escort an escaped fugitive back for trial.

name: Starbuck
summary_text: As his lover announces her pregnancy, a fortysomething slacker receives other life-changing news: 142 people, all of them the result of artificial insemination, have filed a class action lawsuit against him, their biological father.

name: Navy Seals
summary_text: A battle-hardened SEAL Team sets off on a mission to destroy a shipment of US-built Stinger missiles that have fallen into terrorist hands.

name: Swept Away
summary_text: A snooty socialite is stranded on a Mediterranean island with a communist sailor.

name: Dolls
summary_text: Three stories of never-ending love.

name: The Assassin
summary_text: A female assassin receives a dangerous mission to kill a political leader in eighth-century China.

name: Down and Out in Beverly Hills
summary_text: A rich but troubled family find their lives altered by the arrival of a vagrant who tries to drown himself in their swimming pool.

name: Sarkar
summary_text: Subhash Nagre runs a parallel government in the city where he has a cult following. When his enemies plot to murder him, his son takes charge and stands up against them.

name: Fragile
summary_text: At her new job in a rundown children's hospital, a nurse desperately tries to keep her patients safe from a plague of random, mysterious attacks.

name: Stalingrad
summary_text: A group of Russian soldiers fight to hold a strategic building in their devastated city against a ruthless German army, and in the process become deeply connected to two Russian women who have been living there.

name: Merry Christmas Mr. Lawrence
summary_text: During WWII, a British colonel tries to bridge the cultural divides between a British POW and the Japanese camp commander in order to avoid bloodshed.

name: Daddy Day Camp
summary_text: Seeking to offer his son the satisfying summer camp experience that eluded him as a child, the operator of a neighborhood daycare center opens his own camp, only to face financial hardship and stiff competition from a rival camp.

name: No Retreat, No Surrender
summary_text: Jason, a Bruce Lee fan, sees his karate instructor/dad beaten by martial art thugs. They move to Seattle where, after humiliations, he trains with Bruce Lee's ghost so he can defend himself and others against thugs.

name: The Maiden Heist
summary_text: A comedy centered on three museum security guards who devise a plan to steal back the artworks to which they have become attached after they are transferred to another museum.

name: Le Trou
summary_text: In prison four long-sentence inmates planning an elaborate escape cautiously induct a new inmate to join in their scheme which leads to distrust and uncertainty.

name: Little Voice
summary_text: A shy reclusive lady is convinced by an invisible entity to sing. Subsequently, she finds herself noticed by a sleazy talent agent and her talent being showcased on-stage. She also meets a kind but nervous man who becomes her best friend.

name: Postcards from the Edge
summary_text: A substance-addicted actress tries to look on the bright side even as she is forced to move back in with her mother to avoid unemployment.

name: A Woman Is a Woman
summary_text: A French striptease artist is desperate to become a mother. When her reluctant boyfriend suggests that his best friend impregnate her, feelings become complicated when she accepts.

name: The Twelve Tasks of Asterix
summary_text: A group of indomitable Gauls are challenged by Roman Emperor Julius Caesar to accomplish twelve impossible tasks.

name: Made in America
summary_text: A young black woman discovers that her father was a sperm donor, and if that weren't bad enough, he's white.

name: Scarecrow
summary_text: Max, an ex-con drifter with a penchant for brawling is amused by Lion, a homeless ex-sailor, and they partner up as they head east together.

name: Masumiyet
summary_text: Yusuf is released from prison after serving a ten-year sentence. He is scared of life outside as he goes to an address given to him by another prisoner.

name: The Quiet
summary_text: Following the unexpected death of her father, a deaf teenager moves in with her godparents, where she discovers the cruel behaviour of their daughter may be indicative of a dark secret within the family.

name: Strange Brew
summary_text: Canada's most famous hosers, Bob and Doug McKenzie, get jobs at the Elsinore Brewery, only to learn that something is rotten with the state of it.

name: Johnny Got His Gun
summary_text: In this tragic, dark, anti-war satire, a patriotic young American in WW1 is rendered blind, deaf, limbless, and mute by a horrific artillery shell attack. Trapped in what's left of his body, he desperately looks for a way to end his life.

name: The Last Exorcism Part II
summary_text: As Nell Sweetzer tries to build a new life after the events of the first movie, the evil force that once possessed her returns with an even more horrific plan.

name: Dünyayi Kurtaran Adam'in Oglu
summary_text: A family of Turks try to adapt to life in a new solar system.

name: Wyrmwood: Road of the Dead
summary_text: A talented mechanic prepares to battle his way through hordes of flesh-eating monsters after his sister is kidnapped on the eve of a zombie apocalypse.

name: Death Note: The Last Name
summary_text: Picking up where the first one leaves off, Light joins the task force searching for Kira in an effort to avert suspicion from himself---and get rid of L.

name: Animal Farm
summary_text: A successful farmyard revolution by the resident animals vs. the farmer goes horribly wrong as the victors create a new tyranny among themselves.

name: Good People
summary_text: Discovering a stash of cash in their dead tenant's apartment, a couple in debt take the money and find themselves the target of a deadly adversary - the thief who stole it.

name: Prayers for Bobby
summary_text: True story of Mary Griffith, gay rights crusader, whose teenage son committed suicide due to her religious intolerance. Based on the book of the same title by Leroy Aarons.

name: Kwaidan
summary_text: A collection of four Japanese folk tales with supernatural themes.

name: Blade of the Immortal
summary_text: Cursed with a life of immortality, a samurai is tasked by a young girl to help avenge the death of her father. Based on the manga series by Hiroaki Samura.

name: For a Good Time, Call...
summary_text: Former college frenemies Lauren and Katie move into a fabulous Gramercy Park apartment, and in order to make ends meet, the unlikely pair start a phone sex line together.

name: Jingle Jangle: A Christmas Journey
summary_text: An imaginary world comes to life in a holiday tale of an eccentric toymaker, his adventurous granddaughter, and a magical invention that has the power to change their lives forever.

name: The Nutty Professor
summary_text: A timid, nearsighted chemistry teacher discovers a magical potion that can transform him into a suave and handsome Romeo. The Jekyll and Hyde game works well enough until the concoction starts to wear off at the most embarrassing times.

name: Almost Heroes
summary_text: Two bumbling explorers hope to beat Lewis & Clarke to the Pacific Ocean as they race across America's western frontier in the early 1800's.

name: Student of the Year
summary_text: Several alumni reminisce about their final year at St. Theresa's College and the events that shaped their lives.

name: Wrecked
summary_text: A man wakes in a car wreck at the bottom of a ravine must overcome incredible odds to survive.

name: Dabangg 2
summary_text: Chulbul Pandey invites a fresh trouble when he kills the brother of a notorious politician and the former swears to wreak havoc in his life.

name: Katyn
summary_text: An examination of the Soviet slaughter of thousands of Polish officers and citizens in the Katyn forest in 1940.

name: The Sugarland Express
summary_text: A woman attempts to reunite her family by helping her husband escape prison and together kidnapping their son. But things don't go as planned when they are forced to take a police hostage on the road.

name: Jennifer 8
summary_text: John Berlin, a big-city cop from Los Angeles, moves to a small-town police force and immediately finds himself investigating a murder. Using theories rejected by his colleagues John meets a...                See full summary »

name: The Rider
summary_text: After suffering a near fatal head injury, a young cowboy undertakes a search for new identity and what it means to be a man in the heartland of America.

name: Brigsby Bear
summary_text: After being freed from his life in an underground bunker, a man sets out to make a movie of the only TV show he has ever known.

name: Curious George
summary_text: The Man in the Yellow Hat is an oddball museum employee who looks after his pet monkey, an inquisitive and wonderful creature whose enthusiasm often gets the best of him.

name: Affliction
summary_text: A deeply troubled small-town cop investigates a suspicious hunting death while other events jeopardize his sanity.

name: Thumbelina
summary_text: This retelling of the Hans Christian Andersen classic fairy tale has the digit-sized heroine evading the clutches of various toads, moles, and beetles before she can proceed with her courtship with her dream lover, Prince Cornelius.

name: Solitary Man
summary_text: A car magnate watches his personal and professional life hit the skids because of his business and romantic indiscretions.

name: The Gate
summary_text: Kids, left home alone, accidentally unleash a horde of malevolent demons from a mysterious hole in their suburban backyard.

name: Detour
summary_text: Chance events trap hitchhiking nightclub pianist Al Roberts in a tightening net of death, deception and blackmail.

name: Bharath Ane Nenu
summary_text: Bharat, an young graduate, becomes the C.M of Andhra Pradesh (pre-div) after his father demise without any political knowledge, faces challenges in the process of reform the society.

name: Rememory
summary_text: Gordon invents the Rememory machine that allows him to see memories as they actually were. He dies in his office. Is it murder? Sam investigates by using the machine "borrowed" from Gordon's wife. He looks at memories of others involved.

name: Renaissance
summary_text: In 2054, Paris is a labyrinth where all movement is monitored and recorded. Casting a shadow over everything is the city's largest company, Avalon, which insinuates itself into every aspect of contemporary life to sell its primary export, youth and beauty. In this world of stark contrasts and rigid laws, the populace is kept in line and accounted for.

name: The Three Musketeers
summary_text: A young swordsman comes to Paris and faces villains, romance, adventure and intrigue with three Musketeer friends.

name: Ricky Gervais: Humanity
summary_text: Live performance of British comedian Ricky Gervais filmed in London's Eventim Apollo.

name: The Rage: Carrie 2
summary_text: A horrible massacre strikes up after an outcast teenage girl is taunted by a group of high school jocks, all of them unaware of her cutthroat telekinetic powers.

name: Judgment Night
summary_text: Four friends taking a shortcut en route to a boxing match witness a murder which leaves them running for their lives.

name: Le conseguenze dell'amore
summary_text: An introverted man's life changes completely when he finds himself attracted to a young bar-maid.

name: The Madness of King George
summary_text: When King George III goes mad, his Lieutenants try to adjust the rules to run the country without his participation.

name: Beyond the Lights
summary_text: The pressures of fame have superstar singer Noni on the edge, until she meets Kaz, a young cop who works to help her find the courage to develop her own voice and break free to become the artist she was meant to be.

name: Society
summary_text: An ordinary teenage boy discovers his family is part of a gruesome orgy cult for the social elite.

name: Tales from the Darkside: The Movie
summary_text: A young boy tells three stories of horror to distract a witch who plans to eat him.

name: Monster Trucks
summary_text: A young man working at a small town junkyard discovers and befriends a creature which feeds on oil being sought by a fracking company.

name: Khuda Haafiz
summary_text: A newly married couple's life falls in jeopardy when the wife goes missing under mysterious circumstances.

name: Stray Dog
summary_text: During a sweltering summer, a rookie homicide detective tries to track down his stolen Colt pistol.

name: Recep Ivedik 4
summary_text: Recep Ivedik coaches the children football team in his neighborhood. For the training he uses the only free piece of land as football field on which he used to play football as a child. ...                See full summary »

name: Wakefield
summary_text: Bryan Cranston gives the performance of a lifetime as Howard Wakefield, a lawyer on the edge of madness who has decided to disassociate himself from his own life.

name: Sleepover
summary_text: Desperate to improve their social status, four best friends enter into an all-night scavenger hunt against the popular clique in their school.

name: The Man in the Moon
summary_text: A coming of age story set in the south of the U.S. when Elvis was King.

name: Vice
summary_text: Bruce Willis stars in this Sci-Fi thriller about ultimate resort: VICE, where customers can play out their wildest fantasies with artificial inhabitants who look like humans.
